section.title: Getting Support
section.para: ForgeRock provides Support Services, Professional Services, University Training classes and Partner Services to assist you in your deployment. You can contact ForgeRock at info@forgerock.com.

listitem.para: Support Services. ForgeRock provides global 24x7 support manned by a co-located Support and Engineering staff. You can purchase different levels of support subscription packages depending on your requirements. See Support Services.
Professional Services. ForgeRock provides Professional Services to assist you during the key phases of your project lifecycle: design, build, and production. See Professional Services.
University Training. ForgeRock provides University Training courses teaching the information required to architect, build and deploy your system. See University Training.

Partner Services. ForgeRock has a extensive Partner Program, enabling our customers to work with highly-skilled system integrators, managed service providers and technology vendors. See Partner Services.
